analysis.description: SmartMMM.bytesToAddress (/unique_chucks/12/0xe58446caa7f3e10743fe28a91e9331a1c78f432e.sol#193-196) is declared view but contains assembly code

SmartMMM.checkReferrer (/unique_chucks/12/0xe58446caa7f3e10743fe28a91e9331a1c78f432e.sol#301-359) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- deposits[investorAddress].sum == 0 && msg.data.length == 20

SmartMMM.checkReferrer (/unique_chucks/12/0xe58446caa7f3e10743fe28a91e9331a1c78f432e.sol#301-359) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- deposits[investorAddress].sum == 0 && msg.data.length == 20
SmartMMM.fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0xe58446caa7f3e10743fe28a91e9331a1c78f432e.sol#246-257) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- msg.value == referrerPrice && ! referrers[msg.sender] && waitingReferrers[msg.sender] == 0 && deposits[msg.sender].sum != 0

SmartMMM.adsSupport should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0xe58446caa7f3e10743fe28a91e9331a1c78f432e.sol#172-176)
SmartMMM.techSupport should be constant (/unique_chucks/12/0xe58446caa7f3e10743fe28a91e9331a1c78f432e.sol#168-172)
